item.title: Website Penetration Testing
item.description: Note: Much of the below information is summarized from Gus Khawaja’s Pluralsight course “Penetration Testing and Ethical Hacking with Kali Linux”. Much credit goes to Gus’s expertise! Check out his blog in the sources and how to get started with Pluralsight There is a LOT to do when it comes to website penetration testing, and this post is by no means a comprehensive list of everything to do or than can be done.
